item.title: The 6 Most Common Reasons Women Decide To Leave Their Men
item.description:
The 6 Most Common Reasons Women Decide To Leave Their Men

The dynamic, boundlessness, and undefinability of love makes it one of the most wonderful experiences in life. It is the most powerful energy we know of. All this makes it highly sought after but notoriously hard to hold on too. In a vacuum, a man and a woman in space, a relationship takes effort and chemistry to succeed.
